markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs=""
>
[Frozen Breadth](/Feats.aspx?ID=4099) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 185 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Archetype** [Gelid Shard](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=201)

</column>

---

Your attunement to arcane cold enhances the depths of your growing power. Increase the number of spells in your repertoire and number of spell slots you gain from _gelid shard_ archetype feats by 1 for each spell rank other than your two highest _gelid shard_ spell slots.
name: Frozen Breadth
